location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Partial letter to Captain Maillard, Commanding The Honourable Company's Cruizer Ternate, from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter includes instructions for Captain Maillard, to convey from Bushire to Bombay a Persian nobleman carrying despatches of great importance to the King of the Indian Government.The letter is undated and truncated, probably as a result of the weeding and refiling that took place in 1955, to reduce three volumes to the present volume.
